item.title: Before leaving for US Modi to pitch Make in India to world
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will unveil his signature Make in India initiative on September 25 with a raft of proposals designed to get foreign companies to set up shop and make the country a manufacturing hub
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will unveil his signature Make in India initiative on September 25 with a raft of proposals designed to get foreign companies to set up shop and make the country a manufacturing hub
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will unveil his signature Make in India initiative on September 25 with a raft of proposals designed to get foreign companies to set up shop and make the country a manufacturing hub

item.title: Cashflush Chhattisgarh tribesmen broke in 2 years
item.description: When Adani Miningnbspbagged the contract for operating the Parsa East and Kente Basin coal blocks from the Rajasthan Rajya Vidyut Nigam Ltd which had been allocated the block in 2007 several tribesmen in the area turned rich overnight
item.itunes:subtitle: When Adani Miningnbspbagged the contract for operating the Parsa East and Kente Basin coal blocks from the Rajasthan Rajya Vidyut Nigam Ltd which had been allocated the block in 2007 several tribesmen in the area turned rich overnight
item.itunes:summary: When Adani Miningnbspbagged the contract for operating the Parsa East and Kente Basin coal blocks from the Rajasthan Rajya Vidyut Nigam Ltd which had been allocated the block in 2007 several tribesmen in the area turned rich overnight

item.title: Indian man dies of MERS in Saudi family refuses to get body home
item.description: An Indian worker died in Saudi Arabia after contracting Middle East Respiratory Syndrome MERS coronavirus and his family is reluctant to repatriate the remains back home amid fears that they might get infected if they came in contact with the body

item.title: PM keeps ministers guessing on cabinet agenda
item.description: In a break from the past the National Democratic Alliance government has started circulating the agenda for the cabinet just hours ahead of a meeting giving ministers hardly any preparation time
item.itunes:subtitle: In a break from the past the National Democratic Alliance government has started circulating the agenda for the cabinet just hours ahead of a meeting giving ministers hardly any preparation time
item.itunes:summary: In a break from the past the National Democratic Alliance government has started circulating the agenda for the cabinet just hours ahead of a meeting giving ministers hardly any preparation time

item.title: Radio station donates to Indiaborn nurses family
item.description: An Australian radio station which aired a prank on an Indiaborn nurse who later took her life donated 550000 to her family to help them rebuild their lives

item.title: Flood water recedes but fear over casualties grows in Srinagar
item.description: A news agency on Saturday said that the bodies of 14 children were found in the GB hospital There were also unsubstantiated reports of bodies flowing into PakistanOccupied Kashmir
item.itunes:subtitle: A news agency on Saturday said that the bodies of 14 children were found in the GB hospital There were also unsubstantiated reports of bodies flowing into PakistanOccupied Kashmir
item.itunes:summary: A news agency on Saturday said that the bodies of 14 children were found in the GB hospital There were also unsubstantiated reports of bodies flowing into PakistanOccupied Kashmir

item.title: BJP to felicitate Modi on his first visit to Gujarat as PM
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will be felicitated during his first visit as PM to his home state Gujarat The state BJP unit will organise a felicitation function for Modi and Amit Shah who has taken over as the BJP president after the parliamentary polls
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will be felicitated during his first visit as PM to his home state Gujarat The state BJP unit will organise a felicitation function for Modi and Amit Shah who has taken over as the BJP president after the parliamentary polls
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will be felicitated during his first visit as PM to his home state Gujarat The state BJP unit will organise a felicitation function for Modi and Amit Shah who has taken over as the BJP president after the parliamentary polls

item.title: AIIMS recruitment irregularities under CBI scanner
item.description: The CBI is set to begin a probe into alleged irregularities in the appointment of some of the 90odd faculty members done by the central government in 2013 for six new All India Institutes of Medical Sciences AIIMS coming up in six cities

item.title: People came home even when I was out Ranjit Sinha
item.description: CBI director Ranjit Sinha has said that the visitors diary purportedly showed the arrival of visitors at his 2 Janpath residence even when he was away as confirmed by an official register that recorded his movements as a Zcategory protectee
item.itunes:subtitle: CBI director Ranjit Sinha has said that the visitors diary purportedly showed the arrival of visitors at his 2 Janpath residence even when he was away as confirmed by an official register that recorded his movements as a Zcategory protectee
item.itunes:summary: CBI director Ranjit Sinha has said that the visitors diary purportedly showed the arrival of visitors at his 2 Janpath residence even when he was away as confirmed by an official register that recorded his movements as a Zcategory protectee

item.title: Bihar Minors thrashed paraded naked for talking to girls
item.description: Four minor boys were thrashed tonsured and paraded almost naked in a Bihar village on Friday evening for allegedly talking to girls
item.itunes:subtitle: Four minor boys were thrashed tonsured and paraded almost naked in a Bihar village on Friday evening for allegedly talking to girls
item.itunes:summary: Four minor boys were thrashed tonsured and paraded almost naked in a Bihar village on Friday evening for allegedly talking to girls

item.title: Mobile phone users to enjoy better services soon
item.description: Mobile phone users using both voice and data services can soon hope to experience enhanced quality of service from telecom operators with the government promising telecom spectrum trading and sharing by this yearend
item.itunes:subtitle: Mobile phone users using both voice and data services can soon hope to experience enhanced quality of service from telecom operators with the government promising telecom spectrum trading and sharing by this yearend
item.itunes:summary: Mobile phone users using both voice and data services can soon hope to experience enhanced quality of service from telecom operators with the government promising telecom spectrum trading and sharing by this yearend

item.title: New antihijack bill to include death penalty
item.description: NDA govt to table bill in next session of Parliament new piece of legislation will have wider ambit and broaden the crimes definition

item.title: 65 turnout in Rajasthan byelections
item.description: Rajasthan witnessed a high voter turnout of around 65 in the four constituencies where bypolls were held on Saturday Polling was largely peaceful though the Congress lodged some complaints against BJP MLAs of misusing the government machinery and violating the code of conduct
item.itunes:subtitle: Rajasthan witnessed a high voter turnout of around 65 in the four constituencies where bypolls were held on Saturday Polling was largely peaceful though the Congress lodged some complaints against BJP MLAs of misusing the government machinery and violatin
item.itunes:summary: Rajasthan witnessed a high voter turnout of around 65 in the four constituencies where bypolls were held on Saturday Polling was largely peaceful though the Congress lodged some complaints against BJP MLAs of misusing the government machinery and violating the code of conduct

item.title: BJP hopes to continue winning streak in bypolls
item.description: The results for 33 assembly and three Lok Sabha seats where polling was held on Saturday would be crucial for the Bharatiya Janata Party and its opponents like the Congress and the Samajwadi Party
item.itunes:subtitle: The results for 33 assembly and three Lok Sabha seats where polling was held on Saturday would be crucial for the Bharatiya Janata Party and its opponents like the Congress and the Samajwadi Party
item.itunes:summary: The results for 33 assembly and three Lok Sabha seats where polling was held on Saturday would be crucial for the Bharatiya Janata Party and its opponents like the Congress and the Samajwadi Party

item.title: Raise Tibet issue with China Dalai envoy to India
item.description: In the runup to Chinese president Xi Jinpings visit to India this week a close aide and envoy of Tibetan leader Dalai Lama has asked India to proactively take up the Tibet issue with China and find a peaceful solution to the issue
item.itunes:subtitle: In the runup to Chinese president Xi Jinpings visit to India this week a close aide and envoy of Tibetan leader Dalai Lama has asked India to proactively take up the Tibet issue with China and find a peaceful solution to the issue
item.itunes:summary: In the runup to Chinese president Xi Jinpings visit to India this week a close aide and envoy of Tibetan leader Dalai Lama has asked India to proactively take up the Tibet issue with China and find a peaceful solution to the issue
